content:
Ah, I see the core issue now. We don't have any wooden chests in our inventory. Let's check what we actually have available:

# First, let's check what's in our inventory
inventory = inspect_inventory()
print("Current inventory contents:", inventory)

# Check what entities are already in the game world
entities = get_entities()
print("\nExisting entities in the world:")
for entity in entities:
    print(f"- {entity.prototype} at position {entity.position}")

# Get our current position
player_position = get_player_position()
print(f"\nPlayer position: {player_position}")

This will help us understand:
1. What items we actually have available to work with
2. What entities already exist in the world
3. Where we are relative to everything else

Then we can make a more informed decision about what to do next.
